title: Morning Digest: Democratic Senate primary in Pennsylvania gets smaller as GOP's gets uglier

author: Alexis Simendinger
title: The Hills Morning Report  Recount looms in Pennsylvania

sentence: In the state of Georgia, thanks to Brian Kemp, our elections were absolutely stolen.
author: Kimberley A. Strassel
title: The Limits of Stop the Steal

sentence: In the Georgia primary for governor, a Trump surrogate, Sonny Purdue, is polling well behind Mr. Trumps nemesis, the incumbent Brian Kemp.
title: Democrats, the Midterm Jinx Is Not Inevitable
